Fit4Less

Details concerning this project

Overview

Project Github

Fit4Less is a website created for a gym within the Washington D.C. area to create and then increase the gym's online presence.

Technologies used:

  • HTML
  • SASS
  • Javascript
  • Bootstrap
  • Adobe Photoshop
